title: implement github discussions

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body: ### Description tracking things needed to implement #19479 Github Discussions: - [x] update [.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml](../blob/HEAD/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml) to not mention #users and mention Github Discussions as place to post #21647 - [x] Update [website 2.0 PR](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/pull/1242) to stop mentioning zulip #users and instead highlight gh discussions - [x] /support (Add a Discussions, remove live chat and use Development to link to quarkus-dev and #dev) - [x] footer, Discussions below stack overflow - [x] update [org readme](https://github.com/quarkusio/.github/blob/main/profile/README.adoc) https://github.com/quarkusio/.github/pull/2 - [x] enable github discussions at https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/discussions/landing - see [adr](../blob/HEAD/adr/0001-community-discussions.adoc) for names/categories Removed Quarkus Insights (we'll use Events) and add Quarkus Blog/Website for blog comments. - [x] enable blog comment as discussions https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/pull/1209 - [x] post heads up on mailing list - [ ] post news on blog https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/pull/1241 - [ ] setup bot (ping @gsmet )
